Title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
Overview: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
Keywords: egypt, sun, chaos, symbol, artifact, transformers, tank, robot, imax, duringcreditsstinger
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, DreamWorks SKG, Amblin Entertainment, Di Bonaventura Pictures, Platinum Dunes, Hasbro Studios, Revolution Sun Studios
Cast: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel
